=============================
Stock Location Restrict Group
=============================

Allows to restrict location to a dedicated procurement group (e.g. : For orders waiting delivery)


Configuration
=============

To configure this module, you need to:

#. Go to Inventory > Configuration > Warehouse Management
#. Create locations with Output as Parent
#. For theses locations, check Group Restricted box

Usage
=====

#. Create a picking with a procurement group that take product from stock to output location
#. Confirm it
#. In Operations tab, modify destination location to one of these you've just created and transfer
#. Create another picking with another procurement group and try to change operation destination to the same location.

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/153/10.0


Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/stock-logistics-warehouse/issues>`_. In case of trouble, please
check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

info.html_description:
Stock Location Restrict Group

Allows to restrict location to a dedicated procurement group (e.g. : For orders waiting delivery)

Configuration

To configure this module, you need to:

  1. Go to Inventory > Configuration > Warehouse Management
  2. Create locations with Output as Parent
  3. For theses locations, check Group Restricted box

Usage

  1. Create a picking with a procurement group that take product from stock to output location
  2. Confirm it
  3. In Operations tab, modify destination location to one of these you’ve just created and transfer
  4. Create another picking with another procurement group and try to change operation destination to the same location.

Bug Tracker

Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
